@@ -5263,1 +5263,3 @@
-        BigInteger[] qr; // quotient-remainder pair
+        // powsOf5 == ceil(log5(intValt)) roughly
+        long powsOf5 = (long) Math.ceil(intVal.bitLength() * Math.log(2) / Math.log(5));
+        remainingZeros = Math.min(remainingZeros, powsOf5);

+        BigInteger[] qr; // quotient-remainder pair
